courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese nationals; senior high school (SMA) diploma or equivalent from Indonesia (Ijazah SMA + transkrip/rapor). Dokumen harus berbahasa Inggris/China atau dilengkapi terjemahan resmi; dokumen asli/disalin yang sudah dilegalisir / diberikan Apostille sesuai prosedur Indonesia bila diminta; passport, pasfoto, surat rekomendasi, personal statement; bahasa: untuk program berbahasa China HSK (biasanya HSK6 ≥210 atau sesuai program), untuk program berbahasa Inggris biasanya TOEFL iBT / IELTS (umumnya TOEFL≥100 atau IELTS≥6.5 — per program bisa berbeda); beberapa jurusan meminta seleksi tambahan (wawancara/tulis/audisi).
courses.fees: RMB 26,000–50,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese nationals; SMA (Ijazah) dan transkrip resmi dari Indonesia (dilegalisir / Apostille bila diperlukan); catatan nilai mata pelajaran sains (Biologi, Kimia direkomendasikan); passport, pasfoto, surat rekomendasi akademik, personal statement, medical certificate; bahasa: HSK untuk China-taught atau TOEFL/IELTS untuk English-taught sesuai program; seleksi ketat termasuk ujian atau wawancara.
courses.fees: Varies – Medical programs typically higher (Annual indicative fee)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese nationals; ijazah SMA + transkrip Indonesia (dilegalisir/Apostille bila perlu); passport, pasfoto, surat rekomendasi, personal statement/CV; bahasa: HSK6 atau TOEFL≥100 / IELTS≥6.5 untuk English-taught; beberapa program mensyaratkan kemampuan matematika atau seleksi tambahan.
courses.fees: RMB 26,000–50,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese nationals; SMA diploma + transkrip; passport, pasfoto, surat rekomendasi, personal statement; bahasa: HSK6 atau TOEFL/IELTS (sering TOEFL≥100/IELTS≥6.5); seleksi fakultas dapat mencakup tes atau wawancara.
courses.fees: RMB 26,000–50,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese nationals; Ijazah SMA + transkrip rapor (dilegalisir/Apostille bila perlu); passport, pasfoto, surat rekomendasi, personal statement; bahasa: HSK6 atau TOEFL/IELTS; beberapa jurusan mengadakan seleksi tambahan.
courses.fees: RMB 26,000–50,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese nationals; SMA/Ijazah + transkrip dilegalisir/Apostille; passport, pasfoto, surat rekomendasi, personal statement; bahasa: HSK atau TOEFL≥100/IELTS≥6.5; nilai matematika dan fisika sangat relevan.
courses.fees: RMB 26,000–50,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese nationals; Ijazah SMA + transkrip diterjemahkan & dilegalisir; passport, pasfoto, surat rekomendasi, personal statement; bahasa: HSK6 atau TOEFL/IELTS; portofolio/prestasi elektronika menjadi nilai tambah.
courses.fees: RMB 26,000–50,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.fees: RMB 26,000–50,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese nationals; SMA diploma + transkrip dilegalisir/Apostille; passport, pasfoto, surat rekomendasi, personal statement/CV; bahasa: HSK atau TOEFL≥100/IELTS≥6.5; pengalaman organisasi/leadership menjadi nilai tambah.
courses.fees: RMB 26,000–50,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.fees: RMB 26,000–50,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport; age normally 18–25; senior high school (SMA/MA) diploma or equivalent; specialized test / audition required (professional exam and/or video prescreening); academic transcripts; programs are Chinese-medium (HSK required) — if applying to an English-taught program follow SZU English-language minimum (IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80 / Duolingo 100). Indonesian applicants must hold an SMA/MA diploma (translations/notarisation as required) and meet SZU general international application rules (see SZU international admissions).
courses.fees: Approx. RMB 40,000 per year (indicative, international fee shown on SZU admissions pages)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport; age normally 18–25; senior high school (SMA/MA) diploma or equivalent; specialized test / audition (composition/creative portfolio or prescreen video) required; academic transcripts; Chinese-medium instruction (HSK5/HSK requirement for arts) — applicants for English-taught courses must meet SZU English minima (IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80 / Duolingo 100). Indonesian applicants should provide certified SMA/MA diploma and transcripts; translations/notarisation required where applicable.
courses.fees: Approx. RMB 40,000 per year (indicative).

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport; age normally 18–25; senior high school (SMA/MA) diploma or equivalent; specialized test / audition required (performance recordings/video and possible live audition); Chinese-medium instruction (HSK required) — English-taught applicants follow SZU English minima. Indonesian applicants: SMA/MA diploma + transcripts, follow SZU document translation & verification rules.
courses.fees: Approx. RMB 40,000 per year (indicative).

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport; age normally 18–25; senior high school (SMA/MA) diploma or equivalent; specialized practical test/audition required (dance technique, repertoire, video prescreen may be requested); Chinese-medium instruction (HSK requirement for arts) — English-taught exceptions follow SZU English minima. Indonesian applicants: supply certified SMA/MA diploma and any required audition videos; translations/notarisation as required.
courses.fees: Approx. RMB 40,000 per year (indicative).

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport; age normally 18–25; senior high school (SMA/MA) diploma or equivalent; specialized test / professional interview (voice/presentation portfolio, on-site or video) required; Chinese-medium instruction (HSK requirement for arts) — English-taught applicants follow SZU English minima. Indonesian applicants: SMA/MA diploma, transcripts, audio/video samples for professional exam; provide notarised translations if not in English/Chinese.
courses.fees: Approx. RMB 40,000 per year (indicative).

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport; age normally 18–25; senior high school (SMA/MA) diploma or equivalent; specialized test (professional exam) required for arts/teacher-education tracks; Chinese-medium instruction (HSK requirement for arts) — English-taught applicants follow SZU English minima. Indonesian applicants: SMA/MA diploma and transcripts; meet SZU document & language rules; teacher-education applicants may have additional requirements at registration.
courses.fees: Approx. RMB 40,000 per year (indicative).

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport; age normally 18–25; senior high school (SMA/MA) diploma or equivalent with strong STEM background; programs are typically Chinese-medium (HSK4/HSK score threshold for engineering) — if admitted to English-taught intake, meet SZU English minima (IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80 / Duolingo 100). Indonesian applicants: SMA/MA diploma (STEM subjects recommended), transcripts, passport; translations/notarisation as required by SZU.
courses.fees: Approx. RMB 30,000 per year (indicative, as listed on SZU CEIE/admissions pages).

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport; age normally 18–25; senior high school (SMA/MA) diploma or equivalent with strong math/physics background; Chinese-medium instruction (HSK4/HSK requirement for engineering) — English-taught applicants must meet SZU English minima. Indonesian applicants: SMA/MA diploma with strong science subjects, transcripts and passport; follow SZU document and language verification requirements.
courses.fees: Approx. RMB 35,000 per year (indicative).

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport; age normally 18–25; senior high school (SMA/MA) diploma or equivalent with good maths background; programs often Chinese-medium (HSK4/HSK required) but SZU lists English-taught intakes — English minima: IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80 / Duolingo 100; Indonesian applicants: SMA/MA diploma, transcripts, passport; provide translations/notarisation as needed.
courses.fees: Approx. RMB 40,000 per year (indicative).
courses.otherInstitution: https://cscs.szu.edu.cn/ (College of Computer Science & Software Engineering)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport; age normally 18–25; senior high school (SMA/MA) diploma or equivalent with good maths background; typically Chinese-medium instruction though SZU runs some English-taught programs — meet SZU English minima (IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80 / Duolingo 100) if applicable; Indonesian applicants: SMA/MA diploma and transcripts (notarised/translated where required).
courses.fees: Approx. RMB 40,000 per year (indicative).
courses.courseDetail: https://szu.admissions.cn/course (see Software Engineering listing under College of Computer Science & Software Engineering)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese citizens with valid foreign passport; high school diploma (or expected graduation) required; usual age limit 18–25; language: programs taught in Chinese — HSK (Chinese) required (brochure: HSK5 with score above 180); programs taught in English — IELTS 5.5 or TOEFL iBT 80 accepted; Indonesian applicants: submit SMA/MA (senior high school) diploma and official transcripts (equivalence assessed case-by-case) and comply with MOE 'No.12' residency rules.
courses.fees: CNY 30,000 per year (indicative rate for Science & Engineering undergraduate programs)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese citizens with valid foreign passport; high school diploma (or expected graduation) required; usual age limit 18–25; language: programs taught in Chinese — HSK5 with score above 180; programs taught in English — IELTS 5.5 or TOEFL iBT 80; Indonesian applicants: submit SMA/MA diploma and official transcripts (evaluated case-by-case) and meet MOE No.12 residency requirements.
courses.fees: CNY 30,000 per year (indicative for Science & Engineering)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese citizens with valid foreign passport; high school diploma (or expected graduation) required; usual age limit 18–25; language: typically programs are taught in Chinese so HSK5 with score above 180 is expected for Chinese-taught intake; if any English-taught tracks exist, IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80 applies; Indonesian applicants: submit SMA/MA diploma + transcripts; MOE No.12 residency rules apply.
courses.fees: CNY 30,000 per year (indicative for Science & Engineering)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese citizens with valid foreign passport; high school diploma (or expected graduation) required; usual age limit 18–25; language: usually taught in Chinese (HSK5 with score above 180 expected); English requirement (if English track offered): IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80; Indonesian applicants must submit SMA/MA diploma and transcripts (evaluated case-by-case) and comply with MOE No.12 requirements.
courses.fees: CNY 30,000 per year (indicative for Science & Engineering)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese citizens with valid foreign passport; high school diploma (or expected graduation) required; usual age limit 18–25; language: typically Chinese-taught (HSK5 with score above 180 required); if an English track exists, IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80 applies; Indonesian applicants: SMA/MA diploma + transcripts, MOE No.12 residency rules.
courses.fees: CNY 30,000 per year (indicative for Science & Engineering)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese citizens with valid foreign passport; high school diploma (or expected graduation) required; usual age limit 18–25; language: Chinese-taught programs expect HSK5 with score above 180; English track (if any) requires IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80; Indonesian applicants: submit SMA/MA diploma and transcripts (evaluated case-by-case) and meet MOE No.12 residency rules.
courses.fees: CNY 30,000 per year (indicative for Materials / Science & Engineering)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese citizens with valid foreign passport; high school diploma (or expected graduation) required; age typically 18–25; language: Chinese-taught — HSK5 with score above 180 required; English-taught tracks (if offered): IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80; Indonesian applicants: SMA/MA diploma + official transcripts; MOE No.12 residency rules apply.
courses.fees: CNY 30,000 per year (indicative for Materials / Science & Engineering)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese citizens with valid foreign passport; high school diploma (or expected graduation) required; usual age 18–25; language: programs generally taught in Chinese — HSK5 with score above 180 required; if any English track exists, IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80 applies; Indonesian applicants: submit SMA/MA diploma and transcripts; MOE No.12 residency rules apply.
courses.fees: CNY 30,000 per year (indicative for Science & Engineering)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese citizens with valid foreign passport; high school diploma (or expected graduation) required; usual age limit 18–25; language: usually Chinese-taught (HSK5 with score above 180 required); English track (if exists): IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80; Indonesian applicants: SMA/MA diploma + transcripts; MOE No.12 residency rules apply.
courses.fees: CNY 30,000 per year (indicative for Science & Engineering)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese citizens with valid foreign passport; high school diploma (or expected graduation) required; usual age 18–25; language: typically Chinese-taught (HSK5 with score above 180 expected); if English track exists: IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80; Indonesian applicants: submit SMA/MA diploma and transcripts, comply with MOE No.12 residency requirements.
courses.fees: CNY 30,000 per year (indicative for Science & Engineering)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport; age 18–25; senior high school (SMA) diploma or expected graduation certificate; transcripts; language: Chinese-taught (HSK4 ≥180) for science/engineering OR English proficiency (IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80) if an English intake is available; standard SZU documentation required.
courses.fees: RMB 30,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport; age 18–25; senior high school (SMA) diploma or expected graduation certificate; transcripts; language: Chinese-taught (HSK4 ≥180) for engineering programs; if English track exists, IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80 accepted; standard SZU application materials required (physical exam, passport copy, photos).
courses.fees: RMB 30,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport; age 18–25; senior high school (SMA) diploma or expected graduation certificate; transcripts; language: usually Chinese-taught (HSK5 ≥180 for liberal-arts) — if an English program is offered, IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80 accepted; additional documents per SZU (physical exam, passport, photos); international applicants may be asked for interview or extra documents by Law School.
courses.fees: RMB 26,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport; age 18–25; senior high school (SMA) diploma or expected graduation certificate; transcripts; language: some Business programs (e.g., International Business Administration) have English-taught intakes (IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80) while others are Chinese-taught (HSK5 ≥180 for liberal-arts/management); SZU application packet (physical exam, passport copy, photos) required.
courses.fees: RMB 26,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport; age 18–25; senior high school (SMA) diploma or expected graduation certificate; transcripts; language: typically Chinese-taught (HSK5 ≥180 if classed liberal arts/management) — if offered in English, IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80 required; SZU standard application materials required.
courses.fees: RMB 26,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport; age 18–25; senior high school (SMA) diploma or expected graduation certificate; transcripts; language: mainly Chinese-taught (HSK5 ≥180 for management) — English intake may accept IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80; required SZU documents include physical exam form, passport, photos.
courses.fees: RMB 26,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport; age 18–25; senior high school (SMA) diploma or expected graduation certificate; transcripts; language: normally Chinese-taught (HSK5 ≥180 for liberal arts/management) — if English track exists: IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80 accepted; standard SZU application documents required.
courses.fees: RMB 26,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport; age 18–25; senior high school (SMA) diploma or expected graduation certificate; transcripts; language: Chinese-taught (HSK4/HSK5 as per SZU category) — English proficiency (IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80) accepted for English-taught tracks; SZU standard application materials required.
courses.fees: RMB 26,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.entryRequirements: Same university-level entry rules: non-Chinese passport, age 18–25, high school diploma & transcripts; language: Chinese-taught (HSK4≥180 for Science/Engineering) or English requirement if the intake is taught in English (IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL 80); Indonesian applicants must submit translated/notarized SMA documents, passport copy, physical exam form and other materials listed by SZU.
courses.fees: RMB 30,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport, 18–25 years, senior high school diploma & transcripts (translated/notarized if needed); teaching language usually Chinese (HSK4≥180 for engineering) unless specified as English; Indonesian students must provide SMA certificate, official transcripts, passport and other documents per SZU instructions.
courses.fees: RMB 30,000 Annual indicative fee

courses.entryRequirements: SZU undergraduate rules apply: non-Chinese passport, 18–25, high school diploma and transcripts; language: usually Chinese (HSK4≥180 for engineering programs). For any English-taught track follow IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80; Indonesian applicants should submit original SMA diploma, transcript translations, passport, physical exam and any additional college-specific documents.
courses.fees: RMB 30,000 per year (indicative for Mechatronics/Robotics engineering)
courses.courseDetail: https://en.szu.edu.cn/info/1017/1031.htm (College of Mechatronics & Control Engineering / program info)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport, 18–25, senior high school diploma & transcripts; language usually Chinese (HSK4≥180 for engineering); Indonesian students must provide SMA diploma (translated/notarized), passport, physical exam form and any program-specific documents.
courses.fees: RMB 30,000 per year (indicative for engineering)

courses.entryRequirements: SZU undergraduate general requirements: non-Chinese passport, 18–25, high school diploma & transcripts; language: Chinese-taught engineering (HSK4≥180) or English requirement if an English track is offered; Indonesian applicants should include translated SMA documents, passport, Foreigner Physical Examination form, and other materials listed by SZU.
courses.fees: RMB 30,000 per year (indicative for engineering)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese citizens with valid passport, 18–25, high school diploma & transcripts; language: typically Chinese-taught (HSK requirement for engineering/science) — check the specific intake language on the program page; for English-taught intakes IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80; Indonesian students must upload SMA diploma, transcript translations, passport, physical exam and meet any entrance screening specified by the College of Computer Science & Software Engineering.
courses.fees: RMB 30,000 per year (indicative for CS/Engineering international tuition)
courses.otherInstitution: https://csse.szu.edu.cn/en (College of Computer Science & Software Engineering)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport, 18–25, senior high school diploma & transcripts; teaching language typically Chinese (HSK requirement), check program page for specific language track; Indonesian applicants should prepare SMA diploma, notarized translations, passport copy, Foreigner Physical Examination form and other required documents.
courses.fees: RMB 26,000 per year (indicative for education/liberal-arts tracks)
courses.otherInstitution: https://en.szu.edu.cn/info/1017/1020.htm (Faculty/School of Education — see SZU site)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport, 18–25, senior high school diploma & transcripts; this program is listed as taught in English for international students — English proficiency required (IELTS 5.5 / TOEFL iBT 80 / Duolingo 100) if applicant is not a native English speaker; Indonesian students: submit SMA diploma, transcripts (translated & notarized), passport, physical exam and study plan if applying for some scholarships.
courses.fees: RMB 26,000 per year (indicative for Liberal Arts/Economics English-taught programs)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport, 18–25, completed senior high school & transcripts; teaching language generally Chinese (HSK requirement) — verify with program page; Indonesian students must provide SMA diploma, official translations, passport copy, Foreigner Physical Examination and other materials required by SZU.
courses.fees: RMB 30,000 per year (indicative for mathematics/education science)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport, 18–25, senior high school diploma & transcripts; language: typically Chinese (HSK for engineering programs); Indonesian applicants must provide SMA diploma and transcripts (translated/notarized), passport, Foreigner Physical Examination and any program-specific materials.
courses.fees: RMB 30,000 per year (indicative for Civil & Transportation engineering)
courses.otherInstitution: https://en.szu.edu.cn/info/1017/1034.htm (College of Civil and Transportation Engineering)

courses.entryRequirements: Non-Chinese passport, 18–25, senior high school diploma & transcripts; language: typically Chinese (HSK4/HSK5 depending on discipline) — check program listing for any English-taught intake; Indonesian students should provide SMA diploma and transcripts (translated & notarized), passport, physical exam and follow SZU application checklist.
courses.fees: RMB 30,000 per year (indicative for science/computing)
courses.courseDetail: https://en.szu.edu.cn/info/1017/1027.htm (School of Mathematical Sciences / Information & Computing Science listing)

courses.course: Fine Arts (Traditional Chinese Painting, Oil Painting, Printmaking, Sculpture)
courses.entryRequirements: Specialized art entrance test required; program is taught in Chinese so HSK5 (min. 180) required; high school diploma (SMA) and full transcripts; Foreigner Physical Examination Form; comply with MOE Document [2020] No.12 (residency/passport history) — Indonesian applicants should submit SMA diploma & transcripts (admissions evaluated case-by-case).
courses.fees: RMB 40,000 per year (Indicative international tuition for Arts)

courses.course: Design (Art Design / Visual Communication / Environmental Design / Product Design / Clothing & Apparel Design / Digital Media Art)
courses.entryRequirements: Specialized design entrance test required; program is taught in Chinese so HSK5 (min. 180) required; high school diploma (SMA) and transcripts; Foreigner Physical Examination Form; comply with MOE Document [2020] No.12; Indonesian applicants: submit SMA diploma & transcripts (evaluated case-by-case).
courses.fees: RMB 40,000 per year (Indicative international tuition for Arts/Design)

courses.entryRequirements: Specialized music entrance test/audition required; program taught in Chinese so HSK5 (min. 180) required; high school diploma (SMA) and transcripts; Foreigner Physical Examination Form; Indonesian applicants: SMA diploma & transcripts (case-by-case).
courses.fees: RMB 40,000 per year (Indicative international tuition for Music/Arts)

courses.entryRequirements: Specialized instrumental audition/test required; program taught in Chinese so HSK5 (min. 180) required; high school diploma (SMA) and transcripts; Foreigner Physical Examination Form; Indonesian applicants: SMA diploma & transcripts (evaluated case-by-case).

universities.name: East China University of Science and Technology

courses.entryRequirements: Completed high school diploma; proof of English (IELTS ≥6.0 or TOEFL ≥80 or equivalent); no criminal record; age ≥16
courses.fees: CNY 70,000 per year (Indicative ECUST tuition; estimated total CNY 210,000)

courses.entryRequirements: Completed high school diploma; proof of English — IELTS ≥6.0 or TOEFL ≥80 (or equivalent); applicants without scores may take additional language courses
courses.duration: 3 years full-time (JMD pathway; overseas year(s) may vary)
courses.fees: CNY 70,000 per year for ECUST portion (indicative); overseas-year tuition estimates listed separately (partner university fees)
courses.otherInstitution: Examples of JMD partners: University of Huddersfield / University of Dundee / University of Portsmouth (see programme page)

courses.entryRequirements: Completed high school diploma; proof of English (IELTS ≥6.0 or TOEFL ≥80 or equivalent); age and health/clean criminal record requirements

courses.fees: CNY 70,000 per year (Indicative ECUST tuition; overseas-year tuition estimated separately)
courses.otherInstitution: Example JMD partners: University of Huddersfield (overseas partner listed)

courses.entryRequirements: Completed high school diploma; proof of English (IELTS ≥6.0 or TOEFL ≥80 or equivalent); age ≥16; portfolio/creative requirements may apply for art & design programmes
courses.duration: 3 years full-time (ECUST portion; JMD pathway details / overseas year vary)
courses.fees: CNY 70,000 per year (Indicative ECUST tuition for Year 1–2; overseas partner tuition estimated separately)
courses.otherInstitution: JMD partner examples listed (University of Dundee / Huddersfield etc)

courses.course: Chemical Engineering & Technology (Joint multi-degree / single bachelor pathway)
courses.entryRequirements: Completed high school diploma; proof of English (IELTS ≥6.0 or TOEFL ≥80 or equivalent); other eligibility checks (health, age, no criminal record)
courses.duration: Typically 4–5 years depending on the pathway (programme listing shows the joint/multi-degree and single-bachelor options; check page for pathway-specific duration)
courses.fees: CNY 70,000 per year for ECUST-portion (indicative; total varies by pathway)

courses.entryRequirements: Completion of high school diploma; English-taught program (applicants normally expected to demonstrate English proficiency; programme may request IELTS/TOEFL or equivalent)
courses.fees: Indicative tuition listed on the program page (around CNY 18,000 per year as shown on related listing)
courses.otherInstitution: https://umanitoba.ca (partner partner for the joint BBA pathway)

courses.program: MBBS (Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery)
courses.entryRequirements: High school diploma; required application documents (transcripts, passport, medical exam, English language certificate); no criminal record; age and health requirements per admissions notes
courses.fees: CNY 35,000 per year (Indicative international tuition; total shown CNY 210,000 for full programme)
courses.scholarship: Chinese Government Scholarship eligibility noted on programme page; see general scholarships listing at https://www.china-admissions.com/scholarships

courses.program: MBBS (Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery)
courses.entryRequirements: High school diploma; required application documents (transcripts, passport, medical exam, English language certificate); no criminal record; age and health requirements per admissions notes
courses.fees: CNY 35,000 per year (Indicative international tuition; total shown CNY 210,000 for full programme)
courses.scholarship: Chinese Government Scholarship eligibility noted on programme page; see general scholarships listing at https://www.china-admissions.com/scholarships

courses.course: Business Management (Single Degree) — Sino-British College (1+2 / 2+2 pathways)
courses.entryRequirements: Foundation Year: GCSE/IGCSE (5 modules) or IB 22 — IELTS 5.0 (min component 4.5) or TOEFL iBT 35; Degree Year (SBC Year 2): A-level CDD or IB 24 — IELTS 5.5 (min component 5.0) or TOEFL iBT 46
courses.duration: Pathways: 1+2 or 2+2 (1 year foundation + degree year at SBC then progression to UK partners) — overall varies (typical SBC year(s) 1–2 in Shanghai then UK transfer)
courses.fees: Tuition fee at SBC: CNY 80,000 per academic year (programme listing); note UK-year fees vary by partner university and location
courses.otherInstitution: List of guaranteed partner universities in the UK (see SBC page)

courses.entryRequirements: Required documents include English language certificate and highest academic transcript; specific English score requirements not detailed on the listing (applicants should check HKMU admissions pages for precise IELTS/TOEFL cutoffs)

courses.scholarship: See HKMU admissions / scholarships pages (HKMU scholarship information)
